QuestData.Title: Gazlowe's Solution
QuestData.Description:
I've identified some high value targets down in the forest below.
When you get near one, you can deploy my solution.
Deploy it and the objectives will be neutralized with great ceremony.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Thunderlord Cache, Blackrock Forge, and Munitions Landing.
QuestData.RewardText: I always love a good explosion.
